jobs.description: Join our team to build products that make a difference in people's lives.
jobs.responsibilities: Design and develop software systems that power Google's products.
jobs.qualification: BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
jobs.experience: 2+ years of software development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages,
jobs.Educational Requirements: Bachelor degree to complete any reputational university.

jobs.description: Join our team to build the world's best streaming experience.
jobs.responsibilities: Develop and maintain high-quality user interfaces for Netflix's web and mobile applications.
jobs.qualification: BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.

jobs.Educational Requirements: Bachelor degree to complete any university.

jobs.description: Join our team to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy.
jobs.responsibilities: Design and develop full-stack software systems that power Tesla's products.
jobs.qualification: BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field
jobs.experience: 5+ years of experience in building web applications using one or more general purpose programming languages
jobs.Educational Requirements: Bachelor degree to complete any  university.
